n: Heather and Kristen's PB and Chocolate Extravaganza Smoothie
des: "Try this smoothie made with peanut butter, vanilla ice cream, cola, and chocolate syrup for a refreshing sweet treat. You can use PepsiÂ® instead of Coca-ColaÂ®, if desired."
ins: Blend cola, vanilla ice cream, ice cubes, peanut butter, chocolate syrup, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth.
